name: CMGT_Case_Description_Input
description: Input Interface for "description" field of CMGT_Case
sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_RichTextField(
  label: #"urn:appian:record-field-properties:v1:d81cdd0e-c54d-4b8e-beec-b7ae37fefe7f/1282844c-ffee-4473-a3b4-3e2c8f94cf0e/displayName",
  labelPosition: "ABOVE",
  value: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.description],
  refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS",
  required: false,
  maxSize: cons!CMGT_INT_MAX_CHAR_LIMIT_EXTRA_LARGE
)
